If you are a FAANG PM and haven't launched anything for a while because of all the bureaucracy, think about jumping into a Web3 company. There has never been a better time to build. Of course if you are into 'resting and vesting'....good luck to you. https://t.co/62xOYwa0rz

...But wow is it getting more fun or what?
7/ Mexico Fiat Rails: We launched a first of its kind cash off-ramp for Mexican customers to instantly convert & sell their crypto into pesos at thousands of retail corner stores.
6/ We added 14 new trading and 1 new Day-1 custody assets to Coinbase, users can also trade on ~5500 assets via Coinbase Wallet through DEX trading.

5/ Coinbase Wallet team has been on a roll: Adjustable gas, better viewing experience for NFTs on chrome extension, access to all balances across networks on home screen, natively trade assets via DEXes in browser extension. And more to come very soon..
4/ We expanded retail borrow product to 3 additional states (GA, IN, MI) https://t.co/0DHIyoGyKY
3/ Tax Center: It is tax season...we launched Tax Center to help you all file your crypto taxes easily https://t.co/8piDhHSrZP
2/ Crypto Payroll: You can now get your paycheck paid out in Crypto. New York City Mayor Eric Adams is ahead of the curve. @NYCMayor you have your ears to the ground‚Ä¶.this is the new way forward.

1/ Coinbase One beta on an invitation only basis. Pay 0% commissions for unlimited trades, get 24/7 live phone support and $1M account protection all for $29.99/month. Trading crypto has never been easier. Make more money, spend less on fees. . https://t.co/zYTVfUC6FR

One month into the year and we‚Äôve been a bit busy here at @coinbase. Here is a snapshot of some of the products we've launched in last 30 days. We're in the middle of several big product rollouts and tens of parallel experiments. It's a great time to build...come, join us..üßµ
Great news coming out of India for crypto regulation. I've always said India could be a global powerhouse for crypto and Web3 innovation and right regulation could pave the way.
"What you've heard about the pace here is all true. It's insane."  https://t.co/SOd7AqsJVk
Very excited to welcome @tobi to the @coinbase Board of Directors. https://t.co/AOQ8JowyEE

Imagine if people across Latin American countries like Mexico could receive crypto from friends abroad, and cash out at their corner retail store. Great example of how crypto enables more economic freedom in the world! More to come soon.

As an immigrant I personally experienced how slow and expensive it is to send money to friends & family in other countries. Coinbase customers can instantly send crypto, and coming soon receivers will be able to save or cash out instantly at tens of thousands of retail outlets.

Proud of the team for continuing to roll out new product innovations at a rapid pace. Our US customers can now deposit a portion of their paycheck into @Coinbase as crypto or USD. Another great way to keep growing your participation in the cryptoeconomy. https://t.co/vy81VhxvGn

One of our values at @coinbase is efficient execution. We experiment with lot of new product ideas constantly. While Coinbase One is in very early stages, we look forward to hearing feedback from customers in the test  https://t.co/aqqfvXQPar
8/ We‚Äôre building some of the Web 3.0 services ourselves where we think we can create a lot better user experience. @Coinbase_NFT is an example.
7/ We‚Äôre working on helping Web 3.0 builders meet the user where they are. We are focused on making it easy for the next 100 M users to access all the Web 3.0 innovations - especially DApps.
6/ We are building Coinbase Cloud to help Web 3.0 builders accelerate (https://t.co/whYlmriUl0)

5/ Coinbase is building the bridges to help users move to Web 3.0 using fiat rails and crypto buy/sell. We are building critical integrations payroll vendors and expense report mgmt s/w providers to make it easy for users to move their fiat currencies automatically to crypto
4/ Web 3.0 is powered by crypto and we can accelerate the move to Web 3.0 by making it easy to move money from fiat to crypto

3/ Web 3.0 is powered by your identity which is your wallet address(es). And since this identity is also a payment end point, Web 3.0 solves a critical coordination problem. Web 2.0 require centralized services to bring these two together (think Google Pay, Apple Pay etc.)

2/ Every service that exists in Web 2.0 (social media, streaming video, content etc), will be reimagined for Web 3.0. We‚Äôre already seeing signs of this with the rapid growth of NFTs. Blockchain based social networks and communities are getting popular (BitClout, FWB etc)

1/ Web 3.0 is ushering in a new internet which is more open and where builders can get their fair share without the need of a middleman to distribute their innovation (products, services or content) üßµ
